properties.title: Test your knowledge of R Graphics

children.value: Which of the following is a contributed R package?
Thatâ€™s correct! ggplot2 was developed by Hadley Wickham as part of his PhD.
No, this is a core package so itâ€™s already installed.
No, this a core package and loads automatically when you launch R.
No, this a core package and loads automatically when you launch R.
Which R package actually renders the graphics in R?
Remember that there are two primary graphic models in R: the base and grid graphics. Which one is
For the following questions we are going to use
package which contains the budget share of food for Spanish households. You can load the dataset and see the structure of the data below.
The meaning of the variables are described below:
: percentage of total expenditure which the household has spent on food
: age of reference person in the household
: size of the town where the household is placed categorized into 5 groups: 1 for small towns, 5 for big ones
Try to recreate the scatter plot below. Is there anything that unusual that you notice about the plot?

properties.title: Customise the look with themes in `ggplot2`

frontmatter.title: Chapter 7: Data Visualisation with R
frontmatter.description: This chapter will give you an introduction to the R graphics system and teach you how to get started with using the `ggplot2` package for drawing all kind of plots.
